text:
OS: windows with wsl2 + ubuntu 18.04 enabled 

Initially it worked fine till the cross compilation step.

But now on starting from scratch I get `GitError(Code:Error, Class:Net, unrecognized URL prefix)` ; when managed to pass this step, while reaching out the deps of Yggdrasil, I get GitError(... permission denied)

Any idea why this worked before and not now?

text: <@UN5FQHFNY> sorry, I seem to have missed some context: what are you trying to do? build some BB package on your own computer? I notice you are using Julia 1.5 -- I think a pre-release snapshot of Julia 1.6 is needed for this? But perhaps you are doing something else: as I said, I am missing context

text:
- I'm trying to generate binary package by running BinaryBuilder.run_wizard()
- Yes I ran it on local windows computer with wsl2 and Ubuntu 
- Julia version is 1.5.2


Should I update to 1.6( nightly release)?
